alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:30PM AKST until January 15 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Snow has been ongoing across the northern panhandle since Friday night with snow accumulations of around 6 to 13 inches reported across the area as of Saturday morning. Snow has been very fluffy with snow ratios upwards of 40 to 50 to one in the northern inner channels. Snowfall rates expected to gradually increase in intensity through the weekend, and may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm. Some areas near the outer coast may see rain start to mix in by Sun night and Monday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 17 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light dry snow will accumulate quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
